title: Pls I'm only Gold 1, what are these queue times
body: Anyone else getting long queue times?

replies.body: Top/Mid roles are very hard to find and expect longer Q times as those roles are the most preferred, Where as Support and ADC you will find one within 3-5mins, I'm in Plat and i hardly ever get mid lane i always get stuck with support as i put Mid pref then Fill second.

normally i get top lane after about 7 ish mins. I'm back to trying to first. Maybe searching for mid is what slowed it down so much. I find top isnt very preferred on here compared to say korea where it's a top pick.
